attributes.action: Install a segragated cycle/footpath along the A712 from Reigate to Horley.
attributes.background: There are plans to improve safety along the A217. The current plans do not include provision for safe walking or cycling despite the new housing estate being built currently. Please support this petition to give local residents a non vehical option for access to shops and schools.

rejection.details:
Surrey County Council are responsible for the A712 from Reigate to Horley. 

You could raise this issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: 

https://petitions.surreycc.gov.uk/
